Design and Execute Test Plans.description: Design and execute detailed test plans, cases, and scripts for functional, regression, integration, performance, and exploratory testing.

Provide Specialized Expertise.description: Provide expertise in API/backend testing, microservices testing, AI-driven testing, and data validation.

Manage Manual and Exploratory Testing.description: Manage manual and exploratory testing where automation isn't suitable.

Develop End-to-End QA Frameworks.description: Develop end-to-end QA frameworks tailored to business goals and industry standards

Conduct Risk Assessments.description: Conduct risk assessments and implement targeted testing strategies for high-pressure environments.

Establish and Track KPIs.description: Establish and track quality KPIs (test coverage, defect escape rate) for data-driven insights and executive reporting.

Design and Implement Automated Tests.description: Design and implement automated tests for APIs, microservices, and backend systems.

Integrate Tests into CI/CD Pipelines.description: Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins) for continuous feedback and faster releases.

Analyze and Enhance Test Coverage.description: Analyze and enhance test automation coverage to align with critical business use cases and risk areas.

Ensure Efficiency and Scalability.description: Ensure efficiency, reliability, and scalability of existing automation suites.

Define Scalable Automation Strategies.description: Define scalable automation strategies (based on the Test Pyramid) and select optimal tools (Playwright, Puppeteer, Postman, REST APIs).

Build and Maintain Custom Frameworks.description: Build and maintain custom automation frameworks for specific tech stacks and architectures.

Manage Entire Process.description: Manage the entire software development process from requirements to deployment, resolving bottlenecks to ensure smooth execution.

Ensure Cross-Team Coordination.description: Facilitate collaboration between development, QA, and operations teams for aligned goals.

Shift-Left QA Practices.description: Embed QA practices early in the development lifecycle (Shift-Left approach) for proactive defect prevention.

Continuous Quality Monitoring.description: Monitor quality metrics throughout the SDLC to ensure consistent standards.

Streamline Workflows.description: Streamline development and testing workflows to improve efficiency and reduce delays.

Release Management.description: Oversee release management for seamless and high-quality deployments.
